医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
视网膜变薄与帕金森病进展和认知能力下降有关研究表明，中心凹旁神经节细胞内丛状层（pfGCIPL）和视乳头周围视网膜神经纤维层（pRNFL）变薄的增加与帕金森病的进展和认知能力下降相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240124/Retinal-thinning-linked-to-Parkinsons-disease-progression-and-cognitive-decline.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240124/Retinal-thinning-linked-to-Parkinsons-disease-progression-and-cognitive-decline.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e79321a4-17fe-4fa8-985b-e5b79a09df83 Wed, 24 Jan 2024 21:11:00 -0500 Retinal thinning linked to Parkinson's disease progression and cognitive decline
母亲接种 COVID-19 疫苗对早产儿和足月儿同样有益JAMA Network Open 的一项研究表明，母亲接种 COVID-19 疫苗后，早产儿和足月儿脐带血中的抗体水平相似，但剂量越高，抗体水平越高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240124/Maternal-COVID-19-vaccination-equally-benefits-preterm-and-full-term-babies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240124/Maternal-COVID-19-vaccination-equally-benefits-preterm-and-full-term-babies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f528f5c2-d3e0-4584-932e-44128e63d572 Wed, 24 Jan 2024 20:33:00 -0500 Maternal COVID-19 vaccination equally benefits preterm and full-term babies
姜黄素喷雾剂有望对抗 SARS-CoV-2 和流感病毒《病毒学杂志》上的一项研究揭示了一种含姜黄素的口鼻膜喷雾剂，对 SARS-CoV-2 和流感病毒具有潜在的抗病毒活性，可增强粘膜免疫而无细胞毒性作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240124/Curcumin-spray-shows-promise-in-fighting-SARS-CoV-2-and-flu-viruses.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240124/Curcumin-spray-shows-promise-in-fighting-SARS-CoV-2-and-flu-viruses.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8a3131f8-fb90-4f0e-9c9e-2f275e6a2eb3 Wed, 24 Jan 2024 20:21:00 -0500 Curcumin spray shows promise in fighting SARS-CoV-2 and flu viruses
功能性非癫痫性癫痫发作与死亡率高于预期有关密歇根医学主导的一项研究发现，功能性非癫痫性癫痫发作患者的死亡率高于预期，与癫痫和严重精神疾病的死亡率相当。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240124/Functional-nonepileptic-seizures-linked-to-higher-death-rate-than-expected.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240124/Functional-nonepileptic-seizures-linked-to-higher-death-rate-than-expected.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=92ff9262-e7e0-4f5a-afac-74507416c34b Wed, 24 Jan 2024 14:45:58 -0500 Functional, nonepileptic seizures linked to higher death rate than expected
接触常见阻燃剂的孕妇可能面临早产风险在此类最大规模的研究中，加州大学戴维斯分校健康中心的研究人员发现，怀孕期间接触有机磷酸酯阻燃剂与早产有关，尤其是女性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240124/Pregnant-women-expose-to-common-flame-graduates-may-face-preterm-birth-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240124/Pregnant-women-expose-to-common-flame-pregnants-may-face-preterm-birth-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=04d15624-8c10-4ec7-a867-7740eb24ec53 Wed, 24 Jan 2024 14:41:53 -0500 Pregnant women exposed to common flame retardants may face preterm birth risk
突破性技术显示出治疗缺血性视网膜病的巨大潜力UNIST 生物科学系的 Byoung Heon Kang 教授及其研究团队与庆北国立大学医院的 Dong Ho Park 教授团队合作，开发了一项在治疗早产儿和糖尿病患者缺血性视网膜病变方面具有巨大潜力的突破性技术。缺血性视网膜病变的特征是血视网膜屏障破坏和血管生长异常，通常会导致视力障碍和丧失。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240124/Groundwriting-technology-shows-immense-potial-for-treating-ischemic-retinopathy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240124/Groundwriting-technology-shows-immense-pottial-for-treating-ischemic-retinopathy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e4eff395-a9f6-457d-8cb1-7838d0332baf Wed, 24 Jan 2024 14:35:44 -0500 Groundbreaking technology shows immense potential for treating ischemic retinopathy
超声波方法有助于识别有早产风险的孕妇研究人员开发出一种利用超声波来预测孕妇是否有早产风险的方法，在美国，超过 10% 的孕妇会出现早产的情况https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240124/Ultrasound-method-helps-identify-pregnant-women-at-risk-for-preterm-birth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240124/Ultrasound-method-helps-identify-pregnant-women-at-risk-for-preterm-birth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a6365b4d-7e40-4473-9a5a-3e51c2c22f42 Wed, 24 Jan 2024 14:31:11 -0500 Ultrasound method helps identify pregnant women at risk for preterm birth
UKHSA 推出突破性的病原体基因组学策略以应对大流行病英国卫生安全局 (UKHSA) 今天发布了病原体基因组学战略，为该组织在更广泛地提供病原体基因组学方面的作用制定了五年计划，以准备和应对传染病对公共卫生的威胁。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240124/UKHSA-unveils-groundwriting-Pathogen-Genomics-Strategy-for-pandemic-preparedness.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240124/UKHSA-unveils-groundwriting-Pathogen-Genomics-Strategy-for-pandemic-preparedness.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a402ba82-273f-405d-806f-524379a397ac Wed, 24 Jan 2024 14:25:01 -0500 UKHSA unveils groundbreaking Pathogen Genomics Strategy for pandemic preparedness
水稻科学家发现了治疗乳腺癌骨转移的有希望的新免疫途径莱斯大学化学家韩晓实验室的研究人员发现了一种有前途的新免疫途径来治疗顽固性骨肿瘤，这是乳腺癌患者最常见的转移形式之一。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240124/Rice-scientists-identify-promising-new-immunological-pathway-to-treat-breast-cancer-bone-metastases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240124/Rice-scientists-identify-promising-new-immunological-pathway-to-treat-breast-cancer-bone-metastases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=13c49aef-bd0d-4b00-aad4-00862dc4bc4b Wed, 24 Jan 2024 13:47:12 -0500 Rice scientists identify promising new immunological pathway to treat breast cancer bone metastases
研究发现感染新冠病毒的母亲所生婴儿出现呼吸窘迫的风险是其三倍加州大学洛杉矶分校领导的新研究发现，与未接触过病毒的婴儿相比，怀孕期间感染了 COVID-19 的母亲所生的足月婴儿出现呼吸窘迫的风险是未接触过病毒的婴儿的三倍，即使他们本身没有感染该病毒。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240124/Study-finds-third-times-the-risk-of-respiratory-distress-in-infants-born-to-COVID-infected-mothers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240124/Study-finds-third-times-the-risk-of-respiratory-distress-in-infants-born-to-COVID-infected-mothers.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7365c5d5-31e5-428a-95e6-9c0a1ee68110 Wed, 24 Jan 2024 13:41:24 -0500 Study finds three times the risk of respiratory distress in infants born to COVID-infected mothers
